subject: Re: [LH] Kate Bush -- Bad Neighbor! (more details)
body:
On 13/05/07, Bryan Dongray  wrote:
> Donny Bravo wrote:
> > 1. What is the optimum temperature of the Earth?
>
> Depends on what you want on the planet?
> So human have to move, we'll adapt, or maybe something else will
> take our place, the Earth doesn't really care, I'm sure.
>
> > 2. What is the optimum percentage of carbon dioxide in the atmosphere.
>
> See answer 1.
>
> > 3. Why did we have global cooling through the 1950s, 1960s and half of
> > the 1970s?
>
> Didn't someone say it was aerosols?

I can't see the word 'aerosol' without thinking of the 'Not The Nine
O'Clock News' sketch....
-- 
"A Knife and Fork in a World of Soup"
